name: Create a new record in Airtable from a new project event in QuickCapture
description:
Every time a new event appears in your project in QuickCapture, a new record will be instantly added in Airtable.

This template is using a sample "Occupancy Counter" project mentioned in this [article.](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/17035aed761d4dd6bd934eb72f81586e)

Our sample Airtable has these columns:
1) User Full Name as text
2) Project Title as text
3) Site as text
4) User Email as text
5) Geometry X as text
6) Geometry Y as text
7) Tally as number

You can use a different project and a different Airtable schema with this template but you will need to edit mappings in the Airtable module.
